Class MyEngine

java.lang.Object
simu.framework.Engine
simu.model.MyEngine
public class MyEngine extends Engine
The MyEngine class represents the engine of the simulation model. It handles the arrival and departure events of customers and manages the service points.

  • Constructor Details

    • MyEngine

      public MyEngine()
      Service Points and random number generator with different distributions are created here. We use exponential distribution for customer arrival times and normal distribution for the service times.

    • MyEngine

      public MyEngine(ConstantsDao constantsDao)

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      Specified by:

    • runEvent

      public void runEvent(Event t)
      Handles the events in the simulation based on their type. Implements a delay to simulate real-time processing.
      Specified by:
      runEvent in class Engine
      Parameters:
      t - The event to be processed

    • tryCEvents

      public void tryCEvents()
      Starts the service for the next customer at the appropriate service points. Schedules events for vegan, non-vegan, cashier, and self-checkout service points.
      Specified by:
      tryCEvents in class Engine

    • results

      protected void results()
      Prints the results of the simulation to the console, including total customers created, served, and average service times.
      Specified by:
      results in class Engine

    • assignToCashier

      public void assignToCashier(Customer customer)
      Assigns the given customer to either the cashier or self-checkout queue based on the assignment method. If assigning by queue length, the customer is assigned to the shorter queue. If assigning by customer preference, the customer is assigned based on a random preference. Also checks and updates the status of the second cashier and assigns customers to the shortest queue if the second cashier is active.
      Parameters:
      customer - The customer to be assigned

    • assignToShortestStaffedCashierQueue

      public void assignToShortestStaffedCashierQueue()
      Assigns the given customer to the shortest queue between the two cashiers if the second cashier is active.

    • resetVariables

      public void resetVariables()
      Resets the simulation variables and service points to their initial states.
      Specified by:
      resetVariables in class Engine

    • checkAdjustments

      public void checkAdjustments()
      Adjusts the simulation variables based on the simulation adjustments and reinitializes the generators.

    • setDelayTime

      public void setDelayTime(double simulationTime)
      Sets the delay time for the simulation.
      Parameters:
      simulationTime - The delay time in seconds

    • isAssignByQueueLength

      public boolean isAssignByQueueLength()
      Checks if customers are assigned by queue length.
      Returns:
      True if customers are assigned by queue length, false otherwise

    • setAssignByQueueLength

      public void setAssignByQueueLength(boolean assignByQueueLength)
      Sets the flag to determine the assignment method for customers.
      Parameters:
      assignByQueueLength - True to assign customers by queue length, false to assign by customer preference
